column4: This is prudent because it's the one thing stopping me from installing ubuntu. Literally. Somebody with this amount of expertise will know.
Are you really going to be comfortable using a freeware partition editor?
That's not part of the ubuntu package.
I believe the LiveCD should be able to do that, depending on what partitions you have...But there is also nothing wrong with having 4 partitions, instead of 3.
